4420 N. Henderson Rd.
Arlington 3, Virginia
22203
August 14, 19^3
Mr. -James A. Fellows, Assistant Director
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
1346 Connecticut Avenue
Washington 36, D. C.
Dear Mr. Fellows:
In reference to your letter of August 9, and in
confirmation of my recent telephone call to your
office, I will he happy to review the scripts
which Dr. Goodell discussed with me, on the terms
which you suggest.
It is understood that no public reference will
be made to my employment by the United States
government.
Since this work will be done at my residence,
it will be convenient if the scripts and any furÂ¬
ther correspondence can be sent to me at the
above address.
Ver^ truly yours,
Earl W. Stevick
